description: Easy, Festive & Fun Treats for All Ages
ingredients: [{"name": "all-purpose flour", "units": "cups", "amount": "1 ¼"}, {"name": "granulated sugar", "units": "cup", "amount": "1"}, {"name": "vegetable oil", "units": "cup", "amount": "¼"}, {"name": "large eggs", "units": "pieces", "amount": "2"}, {"name": "pure vanilla extract", "units": "tsp", "amount": "2"}, {"name": "peppermint extract", "units": "tsp", "amount": "¼"}, {"name": "full-fat sour cream", "units": "cup", "amount": "¼"}, {"name": "milk", "units": "cup", "amount": "⅔"}, {"name": "Electric Green gel food coloring", "units": null, "amount": null}, {"name": "unsalted butter", "units": "cups", "amount": "2"}, {"name": "powdered sugar", "units": "cups", "amount": "8"}, {"name": "vanilla extract", "units": "tbsp", "amount": "1"}, {"name": "Red, black, and white gel food coloring", "units": null, "amount": null}, {"name": "Yellow M&Ms", "units": null, "amount": null}, {"name": "lime green cupcake liners", "units": null, "amount": null}]
instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Line a muffin tin with festive liners. In a large bowl, whisk sugar, oil, eggs, and extracts until smooth. Stir in sour cream. In a separate bowl, sift flour, baking powder, and salt. Fill liners ⅔ full. Bake 14–16 minutes until a toothpick comes out clean. Let cool completely. 2. Beat cold butter until fluffy (~5 mins). Gradually add powdered sugar, vanilla, and a pinch of salt. Split frosting into four parts: Green: 90% of the batch (tint with electric green + a dab of yellow). Red, Black, White: Small portions for details. 3. Fit a piping bag with a Wilton 233 grass tip. Starting at the base, pipe upward strokes to create wild, grassy hair. Use a round tip (Wilton 1A) to pipe a red swirl on top. Add a white pompom and trim with white frosting. Press halved yellow M&Ms for eyes. Pipe black pupils and eyebrows.
notes: Frosted Grinch cupcakes can safely sit out at room temperature for 2-3 days if stored in an airtight container. For longer storage, refrigerate them (without decorations) for up to 5 days.
